title: Randomly getting disconected from game
body:
Hey guys, it started this week, randomly time to time(4-5 times per game) i get lag at 25ms and "attempting to reconnect" even tho my lan in running with no problems i even ran cmd ping test and i checked it while i was "Dced" in game and i was still on 5ms ping in cmd so i was connected to internet.
The interesting thing starts now... I was out of hope so i used my phone as a wifi and played on my phone wlan... yea i had like 60 ms but no problems with disconnecting... I am out of ideas... Pardon my english :/ Thx for help :)

replies.body:
Given the context that you've provided, specifically that you encountered no issues while temporarily using your mobile hotspot, I think we can safely say that this issue was caused by something between your PC and our servers with your local home network. Before we take an in-depth look at your network routing, I strongly recommend working through the steps in our [**Network Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all your local network settings are compatible with League.

Please let me know if you continue to experience these issues after taking those steps.

Have you tried pulling the plug on your router and then plugging it back in? Routers do that sometimes; they like to malfunction :P

Aside from that, are you on ethernet or wireless? Often times, wireless can cause this, since there could be interferences with the signal, such as people or walls.
